DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate whether different portion size effect overall mood .
DOC.detailed_description: The objective investigation determine whether participant change mood base portion size food serve . The specific aim study : 1 . Determine effect increase portion size mood . 2 . Determine effect decrease portion size mood .
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 body mass index 18.5 24.9 kg/m^2 unrestrained eater ( score less 12 Three Factor Eating Questionnaire ) Report Being nonsmoker currently pregnant nurse report athlete train currently take medication affect appetite food intake Have medical condition affect eat currently follow therapeutic diet Report dislike food use investigation Report allergies food use investigation
